main_definition: To agree to or receive something offered; to be open, tolerant, or receptive.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having a positive attitude towards others and their beliefs, even if they differ from your own
meanings_and_examples.example: She is very accepting of all cultures and traditions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Being open to receiving gifts or help from others
meanings_and_examples.example: After the accident, he was grateful for her accepting his offer to drive him home.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Able to adjust easily and without resistance to new situations or ideas
meanings_and_examples.example: His acceptance of change made it easier for him to adapt to life in a new country.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Ready to receive something, such as information or news
meanings_and_examples.example: The team was accepting the results without hesitation once they were presented.
